item.title: Episode 12: User Experience Research with Melissa Leach
item.description:
Personalization is about building great experiences, and there is no better way to understand what experiences matter than by talking with real people. User Experience Research is a field that allows us to understand our users in a systematic and meaningful way, inspiring us to make better experiences.

It’s News to Me

Research Shows Marketing Personalization Misses The Mark - Reciprocity of Value - Ask for valuable information

Adobe Cross Device Co-Op

User Experience Research Links from Melissa

  • Handbook of Usability Testing: How to Plan, Design, and Conduct Effective Tests by Jeffrey Rubin & Dana Chisnell
  • Measuring the User Experience: Collecting, Analyzing, and Presenting Usability Metrics by Bill Albert & Tom Tullis

Other Links:

  • UX research thought leaders: Nielsen Norman Group

  • UXmatters provides insights and inspiration to both professionals working in all aspects of user experience (UX)—at every stage in their career—and students who are just beginning their journey in user experience.
